Preterit.turoyo: ‘Lu+čalkoyo qṭile Osḳe, qṭile Osḳe. Ḥsayno azzé lu+Šamʕən du+Išḳo, azzele lu+Šamʕən du+Išḳo, lu+čalkoyo qṭile háwoste. Mḥele i+tfәnge bi+tḥelayḏe w mgandaḷḷe háwoste, qṭile háwoste’. The Yezidi killed Oske, he killed Oske. Ḥәsayno went to Šamʕən of Išḳo, he went to Šamʕən of Išḳo, the Yezidi killed this one too. He fired a gun into his side and he rolled, this one, he killed this one.

translations: (Ilyas p.c.) I killed two men today lit. I made them roll.

Part. Pass..turoyo: kət-li mede mgandəro, w kət-li mede yarixo 776; prs 255/30, 31;
translations: ich weiss etwas rundes und weiss etwas
